channel.title: Source Error
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, When i running me source i get this error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:381) at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.(Server.java:61) Press any key to continue . . .
Thanks for reading, and maby for the fix. Skaffa

item.title: Source Error
item.dc:creator: @Skaffa Skaffa
item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

1 2 3 4 KOED:

You have an extra space or tab somewhere. Were you changing stats of armors recently?

Thnx, Fixed it

Read full topic
